text: This transmits revised IRM 2.13.6, Enterprise Networks, Wireless Communications.

This IRM has been prepared in accordance with requirements resulting from the IRM restructuring and IRS modernization efforts. It provides guidance and directions for Wireless Communications services that are in place, and the Wireless Aircards. As of June 30, 2016 Information in IRM 2.13.6 is obsoleted and will go into the Service Catalog as catalog items, and the other content will be divided into User Guides, Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), Knowledge Articles, and posted as information on SharePoint sites.

As of June 30, 2016 Information in IRM 2.13.6 is obsoleted and will go into the Service Catalog as catalog items, and the other content will be divided into User Guides, Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), Knowledge Articles, and posted as information on SharePoint sites.

The User and Network Services organizations and other divisions and functions needing wireless telecommunications services will use this IRM. This policy does not apply to employees within Criminal Investigations (CI).
